feedback.blurb: Your registration details have been sent to the conference organiser. Thank you for your interest.

We have been unable to process one or more of the details you entered on the registration form. This may be because you have entered information in a form we are not expecting e.g. a URL instead of a name, or an e-mail address which is not in a standard format. Please check your details and resubmit the form. Thank you for your interest.
